Package com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem

Class AbbreviationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem.AbbreviationManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbbreviationManagerImpl

    public abstract class AbbreviationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages abbreviations for actions. An abbreviation is an alias for the action name which the user can enter in the Goto Action/Search Everywhere popups.
